oai_dc:dc.dc:title: On a Friedrichs extension related to unbounded subnormal operators
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: CHAVAN, S
ATHAVALE, A
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We combine the theory of sectorial sesquilinear forms with the theory of unbounded subnormal operators in Hilbert spaces to characterize the Friedrichs extensions of multiplication operators (with analytic symbols) in certain functional Hilbert spaces. Such characterizations lead to abstract Galerkin approximations and generalized wave equations.
